title: Positive outlook for Chinese buyers as Art Basel opens its doors in Hong Kong
text:
Positive outlook for Chinese buyers as Art Basel opens its doors in Hong Kong 10:35am EDT - 01:39 
The art fair features galleries from 32 countries and territories and coincides with Hong Kong's 'Art Month'. Saskia O'Donoghue reports   
The art fair features galleries from 32 countries and territories and coincides with Hong Kong's 'Art Month'. Saskia O'Donoghue reports  //reut.rs/2IZZCx7
